reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater runs large and appreciate its quality and style, particularly noting the lovely mauve taupe color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stylish, and Perfectly Oversized
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. I ordered an XL because I wanted that true oversized and comfy fit, and it’s exactly what I hoped for. The mauve color is beautiful in person and looks just like the photos. It’s soft, cozy, and perfect for fall and winter outfits. I’m expecting there might be a little shrinkage after washing, but I sized up for that reason. Overall, I’m really pleased with the quality and style. Definitely worth it! Read more
items.author: Tessa27Noel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Buy!!
items.body: This sweater exceed my expectations! Awesome quality. It's soft and thick. I'm between a small and a medium and got a medium. Its a little big but perfect for being warm and cozy. It doesn't look sloppy. Love!! Read more
items.author: Michelle Smith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brown is not quite brown
items.body: Nice quality but the brown is not brown, it’s more of a pink color. Read more
items.author: Amanda Massotti

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!
items.body: I love this sweater!!! I got an XL so it’s nice and big and slouchy and baggy. Sometimes you see the cute sweaters on the model in the as and the sweater looks so thick and high quality and then you order it and see that the sweater is super thin and cheap. This sweater is NOT like that. It is thick and awesome quality and looks like your precious sweet granny knitted it. I misfit have to buy 3 more colors!!!! Read more
items.author: M. Bedi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: I was really impressed with this sweater. It’s really soft. Well made. Washed and dried perfectly. Love it. I’m about 5’3” 133 lbs and ordered a small. Fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: bleany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy
items.body: I was actually pretty impressed with the quality of this sweater. Well made. Nice and thick. I love the size and length of the sleeves. I have long arms and want my sweaters to cover my hands a little. Doesn’t itch. All in all pleasantly surprised. Read more
items.author: bridgett viox

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Odd Coloring
items.body: Sizing and material met expectations. Unfortunately, the coloring is off. Purchased the off-white/ivory and it has an odd pinkish hue as if it had been washed in a load with red towels. Read more
items.author: Adrienne Heile

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars feels like Starbucks pumpkin latte and a cool fall day by the fire
items.body: This sweater feels like Starbucks pumpkin latte and a cool fall day by the fire. Grab multiple colors cause I can see this being a repeat item through fall and winter.. Read more
items.author: TxShoeDiva

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mauve Taupe, Brown, White, Cream, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
